features: COLLAGEN TONER FOR YOUNGER-LOOKING SKIN. It's Skin Collagen Nutrition Toner is a face toner that uses marine collagen to help improve the appearance of your skin and make you look younger and more beautiful. This facial collagen toner is a must-have for anyone looking to improve the appearance of their skin.

CLEANSING AND FIRMING FACE TONER. This face toner for aging skin contains skin firming Collagen Extract and Saussurea laniceps Extract, which moisturize and cleanse the skin, and Malt Extract and Bearberry Extract that is high in various amino acids, which provide antioxidants benefits & restore vitality and suppleness.

TIGHTEN WRINKLES AND FINE LINES. This nourishing toner is designed to help firm and tone your skin while also helping to improve its elasticity and appearance by reducing early signs of aging. Our firming facial toner helps stimulate the collagen levels on your skin, resulting in tightened wrinkles, lines, and saggy skin.

TEXTURE REFINING AND MOISTURIZING. This skin toner for aging skin provides deep hydration and nourishment to the skin, leaving it feeling soft, smooth, refreshed, and rejuvenated. Our skin-firming toner with excellent resilience-boosting benefits that replenish nutrients to the skin for an even and revitalized texture.

RESTORE VITALITY AND SUPPLENESS. This anti-aging ad moisturizing toner is the perfect solution for skin troubled by external stimuli like pollution, UV rays, etc. Our face toner tightens pores and offers antioxidant benefits to the skin, fighting off free radicals and resulting in refreshed dry, sensitive, and mature skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizing and elevating
reviews.reviewText: I started using this product over a year ago when I found a bottle of the toner on sale at a Marshall's; I purchased the emulsion a few months ago as I lost the toner in a move and really liked how it worked. I have had dry skin my whole life and it's very noticeable on my face, especially in the winter. I have tried other facial lotions and the only other one I've used that worked consistently was BareMinerals buttercream, but I am not a fan of the price and was on the lookout for a more economical option.This is now my go-to hydration product for multiple reasons. I have fine lines which have been present for years, and this product reduces their appearance. The price point is just right. I have dry skin and apply this after showering, which locks in moisture and keeps my face from drying out during the day. It is much lighter than other moisturizers and is also not sticky like others; I use about the equivalent of a quarter's worth (maybe a little more) to cover my face and neck. A little goes a long way which means that I may only have to replace this once a year, if that, so it's also a great value. The smell is clean and fresh; it has no overpowering scent. I also really like the glass bottle it comes in and how not too much comes out when I need to apply.Overall, I am highly satisfied with this product and will purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great, works great!
reviews.reviewText: I don’t like my skin to feel like I have a film on it or burn after I use toner. This is like a moisturize filled toner. Takes off all of my makeup including my eye liner and mascara. I will order again after I run out. Smells soft and does not have any odor really.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far it’s fabulous
reviews.reviewText: Incredibly moisturizing, sinks right into the skin , incredibly hydrating, love it so far

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great but VERY scented.
reviews.reviewText: Very moisturizing and feels great. I use it as a nighttime moisturizer and it's still dewy in the morning. However, I'm deducting one star because it is so overly scented and there's no way that scent is natural. I'll likely look for an alternative when the jar is used up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Amazing on My Face
reviews.reviewText: I like how it feels and the smell is very pleasant and fresh. I noticed a better appearance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Heavily perfumed. May not suit sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: Pretty presentation and solid glass bottle. I was actually pleasantly surprised by the scent. It’s fairly strong and floral, but I liked it. That said, my skin did not. Usually after a toner my skin feels hydrated and looks refreshed. With this toner my face immediately felt…off. My face looked dryer and a bit duller than usual. Plus there was no plump feeling usually accompanying collagen. Sadly within a few minutes I started developing a facial rash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the consistency, and a light pleasant smell too. It moisturizes the skin and leaves a nice glow too. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it

reviews.reviewText: As always best for aging skin or for skin maintenance. This is my 3rd bottle. Good blend for skin glow n elasticity. Also good for sensitive skin but start with few drops then gradually increase your quantity. Thankyou.
Given it to my mom aged 57. She liked it and now I bought it for the second time for her

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Arrived before the expected time. All good with the products!
reviews.reviewText: Arrived before the expected time. All good with the products!

Ok..so this is the best emulsion i have ever used...starting with the begining i was introduced to the korean beauty product by my cousin who lives in korea since then i have been a huge fan of korean skin care regime. And i keeps on exploring all the beauty products.bt this product is the bestest purchase so far for me i was searching for the collagen based product for myself and end up buying this.it makes your skin so soft healthy and moistorised throughout the day just a small amount of it makes a huge diffrnce.you will get a baby like soft supple skin.and what to tell about its smell,the smell is to die for.such a calm and soothing smell it has..just wow. Must buy product if you are 22 and above.

reviews.reviewTitle: The packaging it's really a nice glass bottle
reviews.reviewText: Disclaimer : I have dry skin and I am ok with products that are a little heavy and greasy. Coming to this product was looking for a anti ageing product that would be in the same range as Olay total effect range. The packaging it's really a nice glass bottle. The product is pink in color and is very hydrating once you apply it on the skin. You need a very small amount though as applying too much will make your face look oily. As for anti ageing will have to wait for results but there is no instant plumping of skin given that it's a collagen cream. It's a good summer cream for my dry skin as it's gives me gr8 hydration . But will I buy it again . Not really. I still prefer my play total effect range of serum. Day cream with spf and night cream
